alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 9:32AM CST until December 07 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Georgia... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England, Flintstone...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
